projects.name: Fake image generation using Generative Adversarial Networks
projects.description: The aim of the project is to generate a fake image from real image using two adversarial neural network (generator and discriminator) generator make fake images discriminator classifies either fake or real. The generator improves on the feedback of the discriminator use the classification algorithm and machine learning algorithm to generate the image. Dataset: Tensorflow mnist fashion Dataset.
